mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members_alarm (member_id, alarm_id, alarm_params, alarm_time, alarm_is_active) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{alarmId}, #{alarmParams}, NOW(), 1)
mapper.select: SELECT ma.members_alarm_id AS memberAlarmId, a.alarm_context AS template, ma.alarm_params AS alarmParams, ma.alarm_time AS alarmTime FROM members_alarm ma JOIN alarm a ON ma.alarm_id = a.alarm_id WHERE ma.member_id = #{memberId} AND ma.alarm_is_active = 1 ORDER BY ma.alarm_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members_alarm WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND alarm_is_active = 1
